project.description: Declare and instantiate Java objects including nested class objects, and explain objects lifecycles (including creation, derefering by reassignment, and garbage collector) Define and use fields and methods, including instance, static and overloaded methods. Initialize objects and their members using instance and static initialiser statements and constructors. Understand variable scopes, apply encapsulation and make objects immutable Create and use subclasses and superclasses, including abstract classes Utilize polymorphism and casting to call methods, differentiate object type versus reference type Create and use interfaces, identify functional interfaces, and utilize private, static and default methods Create and use enumerations
